src:
GOTOVO: Partizan ima novog Amerikanca
01 Nov 2019, 18:02 by Zile
Nedugo nakon nagoveštaja stigla je potvrda iz Partizana – crno-beli su dobili pojačanje za nastavak sezone.
Novi košarkaš Partizana je Džejms Bel, koji je prethodnu sezonu proveo u ABA ligi nastupajući za Cedevitu i Budućnost.
Diplomac je prestižnog Univerziteta Vilanova, seniorsku karijeru započeo je u Kremoni, a potom je igrao za Nansi, Hapoel Holon i Darušafaku pre dolaska u ABA ligu.
U dresu Darušafake osvojio je Evrokup 2018. godine, a sa ekipom Budućnosti nacionalno prvenstvo i Kup Crne Gore.
Najbolji meč u ABA ligi odigrao je u dresu Cedevite protiv Olimpije kada je ubacio 23 poena, pogodio 5 trojki iz 6 pokušaja i ostvario indeks korisnosti 31.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
DONE: Partisan has a new American
01 Nov 2019, 17:02 by Zile
Shortly after the hint, a confirmation came from Partizan - the black and whites got a boost to continue the season.
Partizan's new basketball player is James Bell, who spent the previous season in the ABA league playing for Cedevita and Future.
A graduate of the prestigious Vilanova University, he began his senior career at Cremona and then played for Nancy, Hapoel Holon and Darushafaka before joining the ABA League.
In the Darushafaka jersey he won the Euro Cup in 2018, and with the Future team the national championship and the Cup of Montenegro.
The best match in the ABA league was played in Cedevita's jersey against Olympia when he scored 23 points, hit 5 triples from 6 tries and achieved a utility index of 31.
